item.description:
Dear Poets:

This Sunday, we'll be casually reviewing members' work -- new poetry is on the docket -- as well as discussing our writing processes, and browsing journals in the Trident's bookstore. This will be a laid-back affair, to last from 11 until at least 2... members are free to drop by as they wish, but should definitely RSVP so I can make arrangements for a larger table if need be. Keep in mind that as Charles River Writers, you get a 20% discount at Meetup gatherings. Ask me for details. If you are a new member and would like to join us for this brunch meeting, please drop me a line so we can properly tune your expectations.

Mea culpa, my friends and colleagues; I have let the summer doldrums lull me into a less reliable routine. I shall resume more regular weekly e-mails, with the expected literary events, etc, beginning next Friday. We shall continue to meet on Sundays, unless I receive requests for other days. Please note that the indicated meeting for the 20th has been canceled. Suggestions for other venues are needed!

Finally... I'd like to plan the annual book crawl on a weekend day. When before October 15th works for y'all, and at what times? I intend to nail these plans down in the next two weeks, so please do let me know.

All best,

Zachary Bos
Organizer, Boston Poetry
Award-winning Vegetable Lamb Hunter
IM: "Five Quartets"
#: 617-935-4951
item.name: Sunday Writers Brunch at Trident
